name: Turtle's Ransom
description:
A relaxing, cute game about turtles. Made for the Tortle Game Jam.

On your way home from work, you find that Captain Crawl has destroyed your home and kidnapped your family. Now, with their lives on the line, you must do his bidding to bring them safely home.

------------
Game works with both Mouse & Keyboard and Controller, but the menus are only interactive with the mouse.

Controls:
------------
Keyboard
WASD - Move
F - Talk to Captain Crawl
E - Dive (needed to collect shells, but you move slower)
Q - Switch hats
Spacebar - Dash (short cooldown between dashes)

Controller
Joystick - Move
X - Talk to Captain Crawl
B - Dive (needed to collect shells, but you move slower)
Y - Switch hats
A- Dash (short cooldown between dashes)


Everything was made by us, so thank you very much for playing a game we put a lot of effort into making!

All the best :D
